mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_NAME, BRAND_ID, PRODUCT_CATE, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_DESC) VALUES(#{productName},#{brandID},#{productCate},#{productCode},#{productDesc});
